title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.11 - Accrued depreciation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.11 - Accrued depreciation

State Regulations

The total depreciation incurred by an asset or asset
group, based on customary or fairly determined rates or estimates of useful
life, now generally referred to as accumulated depreciation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
